name: MailsterSMTP
tagline: A SMTP server API written in Java
body:
MailsterSMTP is a SMTP server API written in Java. It is a NIO fork of the SubEthaSMTP project since the premature end of it's 2.x branch. It is notably used in the [Mailster project](http://sourceforge.net/projects/mailster/) core.


```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout edeoliveira/mailstersmtp
```

### Authors and Contributors
In 2009, Edouard DE OLIVEIRA (@edeoliveira) started MailsterSMTP project.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this library ? Check out [the project presentation pages](http://tedorg.free.fr/en/projects.php?section=2) for some quick info or contact authors and/or contributors for some help.
